com.connectfour.view

Class Boot

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.connectfour.view.Boot

  • public class Boot
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is responsible for creating/closing the windowed game It is the mediator between all the supporting game classes

      void playGame()
      Instantiates the game and creates the display window Checks for win conditions while the game is played until the window is closed
